attributes.action: Suspend or substantially reduce all council tax due to CoVid-19
attributes.additional_details:
As thousands of UK residents are left without a job, any additional income or been put on Statutory Sick Pay, many are facing financial hardship over the coming months and as a priority bill its just as important as paying rent.
We, the people, ask our Government to strongly consider suspending or reducing the council tax rates whilst there is a pandemic.
attributes.background: Suspend or substantially reduce all council tax whilst there is an international pandemic without fear of debt due to the financial crisis many are facing due to CoVid-19.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
